summary: "Alright, from the top one last time, for real. Name's Owen Oc-..no, Owen Nelson. Mom raised me in a lab trying to make a super...
body:
“Alright, from the top one last time, for real. Name’s Owen Oc-..no, Owen Nelson. Mom raised me in a lab trying to make a super human, I broke out, met my best friend, a artificially made symbiote I named Echo. I lived on the streets of New York for a month. Then I met Stephen Strange, he taught me to use my powers for good and ever since then, I’ve been the one and only Wolf-Spider…okay, so no one calls me that, Spider-Man works too.”

Wanted to try making a fake comic cover for my Spidersona hhhhh also gave me the chance to show off the back of his suit.

blog.name: salcia-art
blog.title: Salcia Art
blog.description: Just a nerdy guy who loves video games and comic books. Also, a big fan of mashups and redesigns!

summary: Once upon a time, about 2011 or so, I played Mortal Kombat wayyy too many times. I then imagined what a Spider-Man in that...
body: Once upon a time, about 2011 or so, I played Mortal Kombat wayyy too many times. I then imagined what a Spider-Man in that universe might look like which gave birth to the idea of a completely reimagined Spider-Man universe that was parts Spider-Man, Ninja Scroll, Mortal Kombat, and Mega Man. The story is pretty much complete but more concrete details are being written down as I’m writing a second draft of the comics first arc where he takes on Scorpion and the Lizard.

The story is pretty much complete but more concrete details are being written down as I’m writing a second draft of the comics first arc where he takes on Scorpion and the Lizard.

The story is pretty much complete but more concrete details are being written down as I’m writing a second draft of the comics first arc where he takes on Scorpion and the Lizard.

summary:
He has red eyes and fangs.
He gets angry and has shadows cover his face.
Has daddy issues.
His eyes get sparkly and pretty when...
body:
Miguel O’Hara is an anime boy

He has red eyes and fangs.

He gets angry and has shadows cover his face.

Has daddy issues.

His eyes get sparkly and pretty when he’s emotional.

Has fought at least one tentacle monster.

Wake up, sheeple! He’s been an anime boy this entire time!

summary: I just watched the new spider men movie, and I have to admit: I'm in love with another fictional character. Miles is just too...
body:
I just watched the new spider men movie, and I have to admit: I’m in love with another fictional character. Miles is just too cute, I want to protect and cherish him with all that I have.

Now, about the movie: I love the way it was made, just on point. 👌

summary: Tony Stark definitely created a program where college students can get and trade text books for free after Steve saw the price...
body:
Tony Stark definitely created a program where college students can get and trade text books for free after Steve saw the price of Peter’s textbooks and nearly fainted

“That’s normal Steve it’s part of college life.”

“That is as much as my mother made in a YEAR TONY!”

“But infl-“

“A YEAR!”

blog.description: sirius-gray and i are friends sometimes | I follow back from princessrococo

body:
Miles Morales

For his ID, he tried to get away with wearing his silkie in the picture (his dad ofc, told him to take it off)

He bought a Latino cook book for his mom and tried to make pupusas. The cheese was so thick though that he broke her favorite wooden spoon.

He tried to become a viner and often got his dad to play along with his skits. Sadly, vine died before Miles got the chance to really become famous.

Miles cried after reading Like Water for Chocolate (in Spanish and in English)
